item.title: Perfect Human
item.description: On Perfection and Humanity Quite recently, I’ve been going through my old journals and trying to sift through a lot of the foolish ideas I had as a child. One idea, which I still haven’t reached a complete conclusion on, is what makes a human “perfect.” While I, quite frankly, believe that this is a foolish area of research and debate, since the literal definition of perfection is unattainable for all living beings, I still think it’s an interesting idea which is what prompted me to write a short mini-essay ono this topic.
